msg.msgText: The trap subscriber was not created because required configuration data was not provided. When creating a trap subscriber, a host, a client port and a community must be specified.

msgExplanation.p: The creation of an SNMP trap subscriber failed because one or more of the required input values was missing or was an empty string. A host, a client port number, and a community must be specified.

msgUserResponse.p: Retry the command with all required input data.
